summary: In order to collect the ransom offered by the family of a kidnapped industrialist, a terminally-ill man frames himself for the crime, but he accidentally uncovers the real culprit.
cast: George Kennedy|Anne Jackson|Eli Wallach|Steve Ihnat|William Marshall|Joe Maross|Dana Elcar|Walter Brooke|Anita O'Day|Joan Tompkins|Robert Sampson|Leonard Stone|Stewart Moss|Charlene Holt|Robert Donner|Pamela Murphy|Abigail Shelton|Douglas Henderson|Robert Patten|Richard McMurray|Jeanne Baird|Elizabeth Colla|Bob Corff|Harry Lauter|Tom Lawrence|Bill McLean|Vic Perrin
title: Zig zag (Falso testimonio)
